version_description:
NEW
• Now available in Korean
• Enhanced order process to increase efficiency and speed of placing orders
• Orderbook introduced in the order flow
• Quick increment options for quantity, limit price, and trigger price
• New and enhanced visualizations to clearly indicate position, cost and liquidation risk

IMPROVEMENTS
• Login detected push notification now displays the user agent and location for enhanced security

FIXED
• Minor navigation issues are now resolved

NEW
• Now available in Korean
• Enhanced order process to increase efficiency and speed of placing orders
• Orderbook introduced in the order flow
• Quick increment options for quantity, limit price, and trigger price
• New and enhanced visualizations to clearly indicate position, cost and liquidation risk

IMPROVEMENTS
• Login detected push notification now displays the user agent and location for enhanced security

FIXED
• Minor navigation issues are now resolved

FIXED
- Minor bug with orderbook sorting has been resolved

FIXED
- Minor bug with orderbook sorting has been resolved

FIXED
* Bug when modifying the limit price on a sell order has been resolved

FIXED
* Bug when modifying the limit price on a sell order has been resolved
